properties.name: reference
properties.description: Form element for selecting a record of a distinct content type.
properties.parameters: [["ContentType","Value","Mandatory!","Name of the referenced content type. If you want to reference a content type from another repository you have to include the repository name, e.g. repository.contenttype."],["Type","Value","dropdown","Note how the selection should be presented. Possible values are 'radio', 'toggle' and 'dropdown'. "],["Workspace","Value","","Specifies the workspace of the selectable records. \r\nIf you leave this option empty, current workspace gets selected."],["Order","Value","name","Specifies how the selectable records are sorted."],["Language","Value","","Specifies the language of the selectable records.\r\nIf you leave this option empty, current language gets selected."],["TimeShift","Value","0","Specifies the time shift of the selectable records."]]
properties.examples:
News = selection news

Product = selection product dropdown live

Page = selection page dropdown live english
properties.storage: The id of the selected record is stored as a string.
